channel.title: The "StarScape Project" beta *Recruiting*
channel.description:
Available Positions -
*Graphics Manager ( forums gfx, user gfx, exc. ) [[1]] Reqs - *Must be good, skilled, In graphics, this means photo shop generally. Must know how to edit a Forum Banner - Make Avatars, Rank Packets, exc. :advantages = Special powers in forums, not in server:
*Server Coder ( For the server itself ) [[3]]
Reqs - *Must know Java coding, If I ask you to add Magic, Range, Exc. You MUST know how to do this. :advantages = Special powers in the server "pMod":
*Advertisement Managers ( to promote the server ) [[2]]
Reqs - *Must register us on XtemeTop100; Post on Rebel Sites; Exc. :advantages = special powers in forum, or in game, your choice.
Project StarScape beta.. Is going to be based in Draynor Village; Unlike any other server, Focusing around that area. ( the dungeon, bank, houses, exc, AND Wilderness )
